attributes.action: (PHSO) Immediately Re-Commences State Pension Investigation re: 1950's UK Women.
attributes.background: The Parliamentary Health Service Ombudsman (PHSO) Immediately Re-Commences Investigation Into The State Pension Maladministration Complaints Of 1950's UK Women.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman which would be taken independently of the UK Government or Parliament.
